UsageÂ¶

To use neo-python-rpc in a project:

>>> from neo.Network.RPC.Client import RPCClient
>>> client = RPCClient()
>>> blockchain_height = client.get_height()
>>> blockchain_height
769332

Get a block

>>> block = client.get_block(123456)
>>> block
{
